xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 7 Vitakkattika » 7.1 Paṭiccavāra » 7.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 7.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Navipākādi
Vitakkattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Navipākādi
40.
179Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā…pe…  naāhārapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…pe…  naindriyapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…pe…  asaññasattānaṃ mahābhūte paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ…pe…  najhānapaccayā—  pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe…  namaggapaccayā…  nasampayuttapaccayā… .
<< Nakammaup Navippayutta >>
